description: Number of reduced binary quadratic forms of determinant n.
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 360.
A. Hurwitz and N. Kritikos, transl. with add. material by W . C. Schulz, "Lectures on Number Theory", Springer-Verlag, New York, 1986, p. 186.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
